greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sequence of coefficients arising in study of generating function for A067619.
reference: Knopfmacher, Arnold and Robbins, Neville, Identities for the total number of parts in partitions of integers. Util. Math. 67 (2005), 9-18. (See last line of text.)
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: nmax = 50; A067619 = CoefficientList[Series[Sum[k*x^(2*k - 1)*Product[1 + x^(2*j - 1), {j, 1, k - 1}], {k, 1, nmax + 1}], {x, 0, nmax + 1}], x]; A000700 = CoefficientList[Series[Product[1 + x^(2 k + 1), {k, 0, nmax + 1}], {x, 0, nmax + 1}], x]; b = ConstantArray[0, nmax + 1]; b[[1]] = 0; Do[b[[n + 1]] = (A067619[[n + 1]] - Sum[A000700[[n - k + 1]]*b[[k + 1]], {k, 0, n - 1}]) / A000700[[1]], {n, 1, nmax}]; Rest[b] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jun 28 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 23 2011
